summary: A Moscow police officer investigates a vicious triple homicide and stumbles upon a high-level international political conspiracy.
cast: William Hurt|Lee Marvin|Brian Dennehy|Ian Bannen|Joanna Pacula|Michael Elphick|Richard Griffiths|Rikki Fulton|Alexander Knox|Alexei Sayle|Ian McDiarmid|Niall O'Brien|Henry Woolf|Tusse Silberg|Patrick Field|Juuso Hirvikangas|Marjatta Nissinen|Heikki Leppänen|Lauri Törhönen|Elsa Salamas|Anatoli Davydov|Lasse Lindberg|Jussi Parviainen|Black Pearls|Bad Sign|Jarmo Koski|Lasse Lind
title: Gorky Park
